episodes.title: A cult leader destroyed my marriage | Guest: Peter Young
episodes.description:
Peter Young shares the true story of how a cult leader wrecked his life. In this cautionary tale, he reveals red flags to look for in spiritual leaders, characteristics of a cult, and how to know if your loved one is involved in a cult. He discusses the impact of isolation, fear, and manipulation that destroyed his marriage, his relationship with his kids, and his health. And through the conversation, Kelly makes a stunning comparison between cults and critical race theory (CRT). 

AuthorPeterYoung.com
https://www.authorpeteryoung.com/

Book: Stop the Tall Man, Save the Tiger
https://www.amazon.com/Stop-Tall-Man-Save-Tiger/dp/B0BW384Q2W
